page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE
page.content: 6.45:People wake,take turns in the bathroom. 7.15:Make ones own breakfast. 8.00:Father leaves in the car,we 2 girls go on the bus to school. 9.00:School begins for the children,father starts work. 12.00:Mother goes to work.Children's dinner,out of school.Father's lunch break. 13.00:Mother teaches,everyone back to work 16.30:Mother and children arrive home,prepare the tea.Homework is done. 18.00:Father arrives home from work and the tea is ready 19.50:We children watch T.V or go out to clubs;choir and drama 20.00: Mother works for school. 21.00:We arrive home from the club. Father goes out,sister goes to bed. 23.00:Father returns,and it's bedtime.
